cheat.desc: P1 For Hasami Shogi, only place Pawn
Rows run top to bottom, columns right to left

cheat.comment: Use in conjunction with the 'Skip Boot Animations' cheat for the best effect, then enable it and reset. The Arcade (MVS) setting may open up other aspects of the game or it may even make the game unplayable especially if you need a coin slot.
